column4: Tates Creek Rd at New Circle Rd
column5: All outbound lanes are shut down in the intersection just before the overpass.  The inbound left turn lane is also shut down.  Outbound traffic is being diverted to the inner loop of New Circle Rd.
The eastbound right lane (toward Limestone) is blocked.
A garbage truck is stuck in a large hole in the roadway.  One lane is blocked.
